name: Planet Squares Inc.
description:
King Of The Hill update now available!

Xbox support is unstable.

Hello, and welcome to Planet Squares Incorporated.
The Universes Finest Square Producers

Please gather at least another intern to commence testing. Maximum 6 interns. Planet Squares Inc. Testing Apparatus™ currently supports keyboard and Xbox Controller input. Please note the "box" in Xbox is not accidental.

As of currently, P.S.I. supports four forms of polygonal quality testing. Please note that "Capture the Hat" and "Team Free For All" achieve better results with large groups.

P.S.I. does not hold itself responsible for injury, death, after-death and radiation poisoning. Please, do not forget to clean the toilets.

Featuring:

  • Local multiplayer
  • Square on square action
  • Fast-paced party gameplay
  • 5 gamemodes (+ "Practice Mode")
    • Free For All
    • Team Free For All
    • Capture The Hat
    • King Of The Planet
    • Marked Man
  • Controller Support
  • Terrible, terrible gags
  • Grump heads

  • His girlfriend, Mariana, for often putting up with game ideas and screenshots more often than not, and for all her support

  • Dave Flemming, for allowing me to publish my first game
  • David Gomes, for actively promoting the game
  • My family and friends, for putting up with me, in general.

Got a couple of Xbox controllers and a few friends? Shoot me an e-mail (miguelmurca-at-gmail-dot-com) if you want to help me test things out!
